SEARCH
Package io.github.epadronu.dwalin.core

Class Component<P extends AbstractionLayer>

java.lang.Object
io.github.epadronu.dwalin.core.Component<P>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of parent to which this component is associated with
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractionLayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElementComponent, GuardedComponent
public abstract sealed class Component<P extends AbstractionLayer> extends Object implements AbstractionLayer permits GuardedComponent<P>, ElementComponent<P>

Describes a reusable interface component that can appear multiple times across one or more pages or components.

  • Constructor Details

    • Component

      public Component(P parent, com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement rootElement)

      Constructs a new component associated with the specified parent, using the provided element as the root search context.

      Parameters:
      parent - the parent to which this component is associated
      rootElement - the element used as the root search context for this component
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if parent or rootElement is null

  • Method Details

    • ascend

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull public P ascend()

      Retrieves the parent to which this component is associated with.

      It's like ascending in the composition tree.

      Returns:
      the parent associated with this component

    • rootElement

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull protected com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement rootElement()

      Retrieves the element used as the root search context for this component.

      Returns:
      the root element used for this component

    • asNestedComponent

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull public <Self extends Component<P>, C extends Component<Self>> C asNestedComponent(com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement element, BiFunction<Self,com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement,C> factory)

      Creates a new nested component associated with this components as its parent.

      Type Parameters:
      Self - the type of this component
      C - the type of component to be created
      Parameters:
      element - the root element for the new component
      factory - a function to create the new component, typically a constructor
      Returns:
      a new instance of the specified component type

    • asNestedComponents

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull public <Self extends Component<P>, C extends Component<Self>> List<C> asNestedComponents(com.codeborne.selenide.ElementsCollection elements, BiFunction<Self,com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement,C> factory)

      Creates new nested components for each element in the provided collection, all associated with this components as their parent.

      Type Parameters:
      Self - the type of this component
      C - the type of component to be created
      Parameters:
      elements - a collection of elements for which new components will be created
      factory - a function to create the new components, typically a constructor
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list containing the newly created components
